data.eml:eml: The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Ukraine, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Maxim, Kuhlmann, Michael (2012): The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Ukraine, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae). Zootaxa 3488: 1-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.246435
